title: Klarna CEO backs Trump's 10% credit card cap, criticizing rewards as built on poorer borrowers' debt
full_text: Klarna CEO backs Trump's 10% credit card cap, criticizing rewards as built on poorer borrowers' debt. Even people who don't use credit cards pay more for everyday goods because merchants raise prices to cover card fees, said Klarna's CEO.. Klarna CEO Sebastian Siemiatkowski said President Donald Trump's plan to cap credit card interest rates for a year makes sense.Spencer Platt/Getty Images <ul><li>Klarna's CEO backs Trump's one-year … [+2432 chars]
